about_the_game:
Overview

 

Net Raiders is a single-player game that combines RPG, deck-building, and roguelike elements.

In order to survive the dangers of the ruined virtual world, you must fuse the cards in your hand to find the best move and defeat the enemies you encounter!

Also, besides enemies, you never know what events you may face in this ruined virtual world, so always be cautious.

On this arduous journey, choose and fuse cards, chips, and items that suit your deck to help your character save this virtual world!

Card Merge System

You can merge two same cards in hand.

There are three merge types and the effect varies depending on the merge type.

Enhance - Card effects change.

Supply - Draw a card from the merged position.

Transform - It turns into one of the cards in hand.

Various Card Effects

Most cards have various conditions that amplify their effects, and players must consider these conditions to use cards with the highest efficiency.

Players should consider using the card with the best efficiency by satisfying this conditional expression.

Think carefully about the conditional expressions of the cards when constructing a deck or in battle.

Unique Player Character

Each character has a unique set of cards and mechanisms.

Get your cards and chips together as you play the game to complete your own perfect deck!

Every run has a new play experience

Each time you play, you encounter a new combination of events, cards, and chips.

Think hard and try different strategies, fail, and taste success!

Contact - obliqoninc@gmail.com

name: Net Raiders

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 800-Series or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1000-Series or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Net Raiders is a single-player game that combines RPG, deck-building, and roguelike elements. In order to survive the dangers of the ruined virtual world, you must synthesize the cards in your hand to find the best move and defeat the enemies you encounter!
supported_languages: Korean, English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
